item.title: Compile Kernel in Android Without PC
item.description: Most of the time I use my laptop that has a dual core celeron processor, which isnâ€™t good in kernel compilation. So, I use Google cloud to compile kernels. Google cloud provides free 50 hours/week, which is more than enough to compile multiple kernels. The only thing you need is a google account. You can use Google cloud in your phone, without PC/Laptop. One more thing, you can follow the below tutorial to build in your PC as well, just skip first step.
